channel.title: openvpn on jouyouyun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in openvpn on jouyouyun's blog

item.title: OpenVPN Installation
item.description: 安装所需软件 Arch: yaourt -S openvpn easy-rsa 生成证书 Server 端 Copy template file 1 2 sudo mkdir -p /etc/openvpn sudo cp -R /etc/easy-rsa /etc/openvpn Config vars 取消并修改以下项: 1 2 3 4 5 6 set_var EASYRSA_REQ_COUNTRY "CN" set_var EASYRSA_REQ_PROVINCE "Hongkong" set_var EASYRSA_REQ_CITY "Hongkong" set_var EASYRSA_REQ_ORG "jouyouyun.info" set_var EASYRSA_REQ_EMAIL "wen@jouyouyun.iofn" set_var EASYRSA_REQ_OU "Jouyouyun OpenVPN" 创建根
